description: This file sets up a Discord-based AI agent with memory management, integrates Google search tools, and initializes the agent with specific instructions for user interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with capabilities such as memory, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: DiscordClient
classes.description: Handles Discord interactions and serves as the interface for the AI agent.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite database wrapper for storing memory data.

classes.name: MemoryManager
classes.description: Manages the memory capture and retrieval process.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Represents the memory object associated with the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Google model used for generating or retrieving information.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in SQLite.

classes.name: GoogleSearchTools
classes.description: Provides Google search capabilities for the agent.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Resets the memory for the current session.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the Discord client to listen and respond to user interactions.
